name: read-receipts
description: A delightful web app for tracking tech team decision alignment

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
